participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: curious and expressive, with a hint of sarcasm.
participant_1.background: I'm pregnant with my first child. I live with my husband in Pennsylvania. I read a book every week. I started a new job as a PA three months ago.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: enthusiastic and ambitious, with a friendly demeanor.
participant_2.background: My current goal is to run a K. When I grow up, I want to be a physical therapist. I'm currently in high school. I make straight A's in school. I won homecoming queen this year.

content.text: hey there, how are you? I am a pa. I live in pennsylvania
Wow, that is a nice place.
it is. I started my new job three years ago. how about you?
my name is pennsylvania. what are your hobbies? I like to read
I am still in high school :(
that is nice. I am pregnant. my husband is in pennsylvania. what do you do?
